(¬G → A8).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that there is normal operation in a secure environment, there is an online transaction involving a pending transfer.

A12.natural: There is a security protocol using strong encryption.

A28.natural: Security audit involves a compliance check.

G.natural: There is normal operation in a secure environment.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the smartphone requires a security update.

¬A10.natural: Fraud is detected due to suspicious activity does not occur.

¬A11.natural: The user account is account frozen does not hold.

¬A13.natural: A security breach involving a data leak does not occur.

¬A16.natural: Financial loss occurs from an unauthorized withdrawal does not hold.

¬A2.natural: It is not the case that the smartphone is protected against hacking.

¬A22.natural: Banking service includes ATM withdrawal does not occur.

¬A23.natural: Offline transaction involves a cash deposit does not hold.

¬A34.natural: Security incident involves a phishing attack does not occur.

¬A8.natural: There is an online transaction involving a pending transfer does not hold.

¬A9.natural: The pending transfer is transaction approved does not occur.
